title: Safe consumption sites: Study identifies policy change strategies and challenges

title_detail.value: Safe consumption sites: Study identifies policy change strategies and challenges

summary: A new qualitative study identifies several key lessons from early efforts to establish sanctioned safe consumption sites in five US communities. The results offer insights on one approach some localities are exploring to address the escalating drug overdose crisis in the US.
